name: Beast Magic Attack
description:
Remove Spell Counters from your field to activate 1 of these effects;
â— 2 Counters: Return 1 "Mythical Beast" Pendulum Monster you control to the hand.
â— 4 Counters: Special Summon 1 face-up "Mythical Beast" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck, then you can place 2 Spell Counters on it.
â— 6 Counters: Special Summon 1 face-up Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck.
You can only activate 1 "Beast Magic Attack" per turn.
